snakeai.tests package¶

Submodules¶

snakeai.tests.testgame module¶

snakeai.tests.teststateagent module¶

snakeai.tests.teststateagent.train(episodes, size)¶

Train a StateAgent

This mehod will train a StateAgent for a certain amount of steps. Then it will print some stats about it. The agent will be returned by the function. The states are not saved on a file.

Parameters

  • episodes (int) – The number of episodes in which the agent is trained

  • size (int) – The size of the board (side length)
